cause.description:
Big Brothers Big Sisters provides children in at-risk situations with positive, adult role models who help them overcome the obstacles in life they are facing. By just spending a few hours each month with a child, mentors can help kids become more confident, confident, and caring young adults.
1. Every child needs a positive adult role model.
2. Mentoring makes a demonstrable impact in the life of a young person.
3. Volunteer mentors make a significant contribution to making the world a better place in which to live.
cause.mission: Provide critical mentoring services to children in high-risk situations.
cause.name: Big Brothers Big Sisters of Central Maryland
